sentences.sContent: Don’t worry about Kurt; he’s a survivor.
sentences.sCn: 地震的幸存者需要紧急援助。

words.tran: 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的
幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物
幸存；生还；幸免于；比...活得长

trans.tranOther: If you describe a person or thing as a survivor from an earlier period, you mean that they are still present or available, but other people or things from that period have died or disappeared.
